oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cabinet card of African American man
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Unidentified photograph of a young, formally dressed black man taken by photographer W. S. Mahon in Nashville. "To Mamma from her boy" written on the back. Photographed by W. S. Mahon on the Public Square in Nashville, Tenn., who according to information written on the back was in business at 117 Courthouse Square from 1888 to 1891.
